name: NEW! Novo Bracelet
description:
Double-sided Sterling Silver or Rose Bronze amulets from the 'Marked Men' Collection.  Handmade, strung on chain or natural silk.

These bracelets are the perfect way to subtly accessorise, and make a great gift even for someone who might not usually wear jewellery.

The design is a contemporary interpretation of the ancient Egyptian belief that the scarab beetle was a symbol of rebirth.  The beetle was used to represent the god Khepri, who was thought to push the sun disc through the morning sky, as a scarab beetle pushes its ball of dung.  Each day the sun disappeared, always to rise again and be reborn the following day.  Thus the scarab beetle became a symbol of hope and renewal.

The design is double-sided, with the abstracted hieroglyph of the scarab on one side and the eternally rising sun on the other.  The chains are oxidised to match the detail of the amulet, and the 100% natural silk cords are extremely strong and flexible. 

Crafted in: matt finished solid 925 sterling silver or rose bronze
Dimensions: for amulets on chains, the standard length is 20.5cm.  Amulets on silk are adjustable length - at the largest, the standard length is 25cm.

We can custom make a bracelet to a particular length if you'd like, simply message or email us once you have ordered.

options.name: Rose Bronze Amulet on black silk

Clean lines and a minimal design make these cufflinks timeless and easy to pair with any shirt you like.

Dimensions: Front 18mm x 10mm, Overall 20mm long

description:
Handmade solid Sterling Silver cufflinks with black oxidised details, from the '6000s' Collection.

Clean lines and a minimal design make these cufflinks timeless and easy to pair with any shirt you like.

As they are solid Silver (not stainless steel), they can also be custom engraved for an extra special touch.  Get in touch with us to discuss this.

Crafted in: matt finished solid 925 sterling silver
Dimensions: Front 15mm diameter, Overall 20mm long

Also available in rose bronze

Handmade stud earrings from the '6000s' Collection - 
Solid Sterling Silver handmade round stud earrings with black oxidised detail.

Designed for the guys and girls who want something unique to wear, every day. Simple yet striking, it will complement any outfit.

Crafted in: matt finished solid 925 sterling silver (including post and butterfly backs)
Dimensions: 6mm dia.

Available as a pair or single stud.

name: Menti Cardinis Necklace
description:
Double-sided Sterling Silver pivoting pendant and chain.
Handmade to order.  Limited run of 200.

This limited edition pendant was inspired by the mobile artwork of Alexander Calder.  The inner piece pivots and is finished matt black on one side, silver on the other. 

Its clean, simple form looks great over a plain tee or jumper, and double-sided finish means having two pendants in one. Each piece is stamped with the bmd logo and item number, making this the perfect collector's item or gift for the person who has everything.

Crafted in: matt finished solid 925 sterling silver, black finish
Dimensions: 45mm long x 15mm wide
chain:70cm long blackened 925 sterling silver with signature bmd detail

You may also like:
- Ovi Cardinis Necklace
- Twin Souls Necklace

name: Solitary Soul Necklace
description:
Double-sided Rose Bronze pendant & chain from the 'Marked Men' Collection. Handmade, limited edition design.

This is the necklace for the person who likes to stand out from the crowd. Wherever you wear it, this necklace is sure to start a conversation.  

The design was inspired by the ancient egyptian's symbol for 'ba' - the spirit believed to guide an individual's conscience during life, and live on into eternity after death.

The graphic detail cleverly wraps around the pendant differently on each side, so you'll have two different ways of wearing it.

Crafted in: matt finished solid bronze
Dimensions: 65mm wide
Chain: 70cm long with signature bmd detail

Also available in solid Sterling Silver

You may also like:
- Twin Souls Pendant
- Twin Souls Ring

name: Twin Souls Necklace
description:
Solid Antique Brass pendant and chain from the 'Marked Men' Collection.  Handmade, limited edition design.

This luxuriously weighty pendant will lend a contemporary statement to any outfit.  The graphic detail wrapping around the penant is our interpretation of the ancient egyptian heiroglyphic for 'ka' - that vital part of the soul they believed was breathed into a person's body at their birth. 

Crafted in: matt finished solid brass
Dimensions: 50mm length
Chain: 70cm long with signature bmd detail

Also available in 925 solid Sterling Silver

You may also like:

- Solitary Soul Pendant

name: Sun Necklace
description:
Black Brass pendant and chain from the 'Marked Men' collection. Handmade, limited edition design.

Just like your favourite pair of jeans, this pendant will develop its own character over time.  As it's worn, the black finish will fade to reveal the golden lustre of brass underneath.  

The etched line detail wraps its way around the pendant in an infinite circle, inspired by ancient egyptian drawings of the coiled serpent wrapped around the sun-disc worn by the solar deity Ra.

Crafted in: matt finished solid brass with black finish
Dimensions: 20mm round
Chain: 70mm long with signature bmd detail

You may also lke:
- 6000 pendant
- Solitary Soul pendant
- Twin Souls ring

name: Twin Souls Ring
description:
Bronze band with graphic detail

A minimal and modern interpretation of the ancient egyptian heiroglyphic 'ka' - representing that vital part of the soul they believed was breathed into a person's body at their birth.  The graphic detail wraps infinitely around the band, leaving one side plain and the other detailed - giving you a choice of which way to wear it.  The band also doubles up as a necklace when hung on a chain or cord.

With wear, the ring's matt finish will become polished, but can easily be restored.

Crafted in: Matt finished solid bronze 
*A note to bear in mind: some people's skin may become green under a bronze ring. This is not uncommon, and it will easily wash off. If you are concerned about this, we recommend our 925 sterling silver ring.
Dimensions: 8mm wide
Sizes: Small, medium and large. We can also custom make this ring to your specific size - please email us for pricing and more information.

Also available in solid 925 sterling silver
